document.full_text: france and britain called on monday for supporters of libyan leader muammar gaddafi to drop him before it was "too late" and asked libyans opposing him to join a political process to pave the way for his departure.
document.title: france, uk urge gaddafi supporters to drop him now
lines_and_colors: france and britain called on monday for supporters of libyan leader muammar gaddafi to drop him before it was "too late" and asked libyans opposing him to join a political process to pave the way for his departure.
